channel.title: KillBait RSS Feed
channel.description: KillBait - News highlights delivered clearly and responsibly—no clickbait, no sensationalism

item.title: A non-clickbait, descriptive headline based on the article content
item.description: A rewritten summary of the article (200+ words, <500 words) highlighting the key points, context, and implications.
